snippet: The government applied on Friday for the status of a core participant, given to those with a special interest in the hearings’ outcome, days before two key figures in the scandal were set to testify.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Ravi Somaiya reported from London, and Alan Cowell from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: The government applied on Friday for the status of a core participant, given to those with a special interest in the hearings’ outcome, days before two key figures in the scandal were set to testify.

headline.seo: British Government Seeks Special Status at Hacking Inquiry
headline.main: British Government Seeks Special Status at Hacking Inquiry
headline.print_headline: British Government Seeks Special Status at Hacking Inquiry

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
